FuncDef:
The nat traversal command enables NAT traversal.
The undo nat traversal command restores the default setting.
By default, the NAT traversal is disabled.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
When a NAT gateway is deployed between the two peers of an IPSec tunnel, you need to enable the NAT traversal function.
Precautions
In IPsec traversal NAT scenarios, VSUs cannot balance IPsec traffic.
